name: Lookyloo_Screenshot
author: THA-CERT - PVA
description: Take a screenshot of an url, domain, FQDN or IP and report all HTTP redirections

configurationItems.name: Lookyloo_instance
configurationItems.description: Should be a URL. By default: https://lookyloo.circl.lu/

configurationItems.name: Capture_timeout
configurationItems.description: In seconds. Max analysis time, after, the query will stop. Default: 120s
